code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PublicPairTable=_ref=>{let{items,searchTerm}=_ref;const highlightText=(text,searchTerm)=>{if(!searchTerm||!text)return text;const regex=new RegExp(`(${searchTerm.replace(/[.*+?^${}()|[\]\\]/g,'\\$&')})`,'gi');const parts=text.split(regex);return parts.map((part,index)=>regex.test(part)?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"highlight",children:part},index):part);};if(!items||items.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"public-app-block",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No items available for this category."})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"public-pair-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Traditional Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"English Name"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:highlightText(item.traditional||'',searchTerm)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:highlightText(item.english||'',searchTerm)})]},index))})]});};export default PublicPairTable;
